title: Accessories

Psychic Missiles: Shoot an additional dart whenever you cast Magic Missile.

Magic Missile.Level 1 Evocation Spell

Scarab of Protection

Spell Protection: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against Spells

Necromantic Evasion: When you fail a Saving Throw against necromancy spells or spells cast by undead foes, you can use your reaction to succeed instead

The wearer of this item gains:

Shatter: Level 2 Evocation SpellTalk to the Sentient Amulet: Free Action
